clients.title: Content is King
description: Thin and poor-quality content may negatively affect your website’s search engine optimization. One of the best investments a law firm can make is in high-quality, original, focused content for their website. We recommend reviewing your site's content, beefing up the shorter pages, and revising any that have duplicative, obsolete, or “fluffy” (i.e., not legally substantive) content.

jld.title: Justia Lawyer Rating and Reviews
description: The Justia Lawyer Directory features attorney reviews and ratings. Don’t miss out on your chance to showcase your Justia Lawyer Rating badge on your websites, blogs, and other properties!
